articles.description: The Galaxy S21 FE is finally here, but how does it compare to the regular Galaxy S21 from last year? Read on to find out.
articles.content: Following months of rumors, leaks, and (possible) delays, Samsung finally released the Galaxy 21 FE on January 3, 2022 the ‘FE’ standing for ‘Fan Edition.’ The phone is a sequel to the much-loved Gal… [+9228 chars]
